titles.title: What Can I Give To Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh what can I give
to Jesus, to Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh what can I give to Jesus
who gave himself for me?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, how can I show my love for Him,
who died on Calvary?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I'll give my life to Jesus and calmly,gladly rest

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Each future hope and fond desire
upon His loving breast

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I'll give my voice to Jesus
and seek through all my days

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
My every talent consecrate
to sing His joyous praise

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
I'll give my strength to Jesus of head,
of heart, of will

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Go where he sends
and ever strive his purpose to fulfill

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: I'll give my all to Jesus though little I possess,

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
Take what I am
and have, dear Lord accept and bless,

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
Oh what can I give to Jesus,
who gave Himself for me

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: I'll give my all to Jesus who died on calvary
